known_issues: Direction buttons (keyboard/mouse controls) are not functioning properly

existing_features.title: Create a 3D game environment using Three.js and React Three Fiber with interactive gameplay mechanics
Create game controls interface with keyboard/mouse input handling for player actions
Design a vibrant, energetic visual theme with bold neon colors (cyan, magenta, electric yellow), futuristic typography, and dynamic gradient backgrounds that evoke arcade and cyberpunk aesthetics
Implement leaderboard functionality to display top scores from all players
Debug and fix the keyboard direction controls (WASD and arrow keys) to properly control player movement in the 3D game scene

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement game state management to track player progress, score, and game status (playing, paused, game over)
